refnamediv.refpurpose: shell script to copy bogofilter working directories

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: bf_copy copies a bogofilter working directory with the wordlist.db and related files (currently only the log.* files and perhaps DB_CONFIG, if present) from to another directory.

refsect1.title: EXIT STATUS
refsect1.para: The script exits with status code 0 if everything went well, and nonzero if it encountered trouble.

refsect1.title: OPTIONS
refsect1.para: The -c option causes only active log files to be copied, not all. The default is to copy all log files.

refsect1.title: NOTES
refsect1.para: This script expects a SUSv2 compliant shell, and will use /usr/xpg4/bin/sh on Solaris if it was available at the time bogofilter was built. Solaris systems should have the SUNWxcu4 package installed.
